name: aliane dav
review: The Sorcerer's Stone is about a boy name Harry Potter who learns that he is a wizard and receives and invitation to join Hogwarts, the best school of Witchcraft in the world. I wish I could read Harry Potter And The Sorcerers Stone again for the first time. It kept me spell bound, and I was compelled to keep reading. I am blown away by the author’s ability to write such phenomenal scenes. Read it! I promise, you’ll be hooked
